patient invite: Click here to access your video consultation with your caregiver %(doctorName)s : %(url)s
guest invite: Click here to access your video consultation with your caregiver %(doctorName)s : %(url)s
scheduled patient invite:
Hello, you have been invited to a telemedicine %(branding)s tele-consultation at %(inviteTime)s. We recommend that you test the compatibility of your device in advance using the following link.

%(testingUrl)s
scheduled guest invite: Hello, you have been invited to a telemedicine % (branding)s tele-consultation at %(inviteTime)s. We recommend that you test the compatibility of your device in advance using the following link. %(testingUrl)s
first invite reminder: D-1 reminder Your %(branding)s telemedicine consultation will take place tomorrow at %(inviteTime)s
second invite reminder: Your consultation will start in a minute: %(url)s
first guest invite reminder: D-1 reminder Your %(branding)s telemedicine consultation will take place tomorrow at %(inviteTime)s
second guest invite reminder: Your consultation will start in a minute: %(url)s
translation request email:
Dear interpreter, 

We have received a request from a caregiver for an interpreter on the %(branding)s platform: 
Caregiver language: %(doctorLanguage)s 
Patient language: %(patientLanguage)s 
Date: as soon as possible 
In order to confirm or your availability or not, please click on the link below %(url)s 

If, after 48 hours, no one confirms their availability, we will assume that no one is available. 


Thank you
scheduled translation request email:

translator login link email: Please click here to join the consultation %(url)s
invite have been accepted: This invitation has already been accepted.
translation request refused body: Unfortunately, your request for an interpreter for one of your tele-consultations has not been accepted. Please repeat your interpretation request from %(branding)s interface.
translator is ready:
Hello,
 
The interpreter has accepted your invitation to your consultation. Please login to %(branding)s to start support.
patient is ready: Un patient est dans la file d'attente. Vous pouvez lui fournir une estimation de son attente avec le lien suivant %(url)s
